## Problem 1: Buzz Fizz
```{r Problem 1, Orlando version}
value = 0
for (i in 1:100){
  if (i %% 3 == 0 && i %% 5 == 0){
    print("Buzz Fizz")
  } else if (i %% 3 == 0){
    print("Fizz")
  } else if (i %% 5 == 0){
    print("Buzz")
  } else (print(i))
}
```
